text: Ilya Salmanzadeh (born 19 September 1986), known simply as Ilya, is a Swedish songwriter and music producer. Raised in Stockholm, he became known for writing and producing Ariana Grande's song, "Problem", with Max Martin. He has also worked on other songs with singers including Jennifer Lopez, Cher Lloyd and Jessie J. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish songwriters Category:Swedish record producers
title: Ilya Salmanzadeh
